software.amazon.s3.analyticsaccelerator

Class S3SeekableInputStreamFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • software.amazon.s3.analyticsaccelerator.S3SeekableInputStreamFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class S3SeekableInputStreamFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Initialises resources to prepare for reading from S3. Resources initialised in this class are shared across instances of S3SeekableInputStream. For example, this allows for the same S3 client to be used across multiple input streams for more efficient connection management etc.

    This factory does NOT assume ownership of the passed ObjectClient. It is the responsibility of the caller to close the client and to make sure that it remains active for createStream(S3URI) to vend correct SeekableInputStream.

                                    @NonNull S3SeekableInputStreamConfiguration configuration)
        Creates a new instance of S3SeekableInputStreamFactory. This factory should be used to create instances of the input stream to allow for sharing resources such as the object client between streams.
        Parameters:
        objectClient - Object client
        configuration - S3SeekableInputStream configuration
